item.title: Create AWS VPC with Subnets using Terraform - Infra As Code
item.description: In this article, I’ll walk you through the simple steps of creating an AWS Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) with both public and private subnets using Terraform, while ensuring we follow the best practices. AWS VPC Component Below is a list of components we are going to create: One VPC One private subnets One public subnets One internet gateway for public internet traffic One route table One route table association Let’s Start!
